name: Lay 'Em Out Hockey
description:
Lay 'em Out Hockey is the exciting bodychecking game where you bodycheck the opposition as far as possible to earn and collect points.

To control your player simply tilt your device from side to side, use one of the power hits by timing the button press to increase hitting power. Tap the screen to add more force to your player, collect as many power-ups as you can! You have five attempts to get as many points as possible.
